channel.title: You Can Read the Bible Christian Education Video Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: With only 15 minutes a day Monday through Saturday, you can journey through the Bible in 15 months. Join us as we walk through the Word together at You Can Read the Bible.
channel.itunes:author: You Can Read the Bible
channel.itunes:subtitle: Christian Education Video Podcast
